channel.title: Portal
channel.description:
Yo guys, i need some help adding 3-6 portals on my server. I have teamviewer. If you would help me add me on tweezy@hotmail.co.uk
If we can get to work, you can have MOD on my server when i release.
Thanks! ~Johno

item.title: Portal
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

So, i add the code under packet 132?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2009, 12:56:17 pm[/size][hr]I still don’t no where to add

case 2468:
teleportToX = 2738;
teleportToY = 3473;
sendMessage(“You teleport to low level train.”);

It doesn’t come into case 132

Read full topic

item.title: Portal
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:5, topic:280547”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=370549.msg2800554#msg2800554 date=1243362807]
You don’t need a switch statement… You add the clause under the first click object packet.
[/quote]

Lost me LOL! Please can you add me on msn and go through it with me? I even have teamviewer![/quote]
I think the object click one packet is 132.

Read full topic
